RatMeX

  • SEARCH: 
 

Package stincmale.ratmex.executor

Contains tools for executing tasks with a fixed rate.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RateListener<E extends RateMeasuredEvent>
    A listener allowing monitoring the rate and reacting if there are deviations from the target rate.
    RateMeasuringExecutorService<C extends ScheduledTaskConfig<E>,E extends RateMeasuredEvent>
    A rate-measuring executor service which not only executes tasks with a fixed rate, but also measures the actual rate completion of the tasks and allows one to monitor the rate and react if the executor has failed to conform to the target rate.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultRateListener<E extends RateMeasuredEvent>
    A default implementation of RateListener which throws RateException if notices that the target rate is not respected.
    DefaultSubmitterWorkerRateListener<E extends SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuredEvent<SRS,WRS>,SRS,WRS extends ConcurrentRateMeterStats>
    A default implementation of RateListener which throws RateException if notices that the target rate is not respected by either submitter or worker.
    Rate
    A representation of a rate.
    RateMeasuredEvent
    A container with data provided to RateListener by RateMeasuringExecutorService.
    ScheduledTaskConfig<E extends RateMeasuredEvent>
    A configuration of a scheduled task.
    ScheduledTaskConfig.Builder<E extends RateMeasuredEvent>  
    SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuredEvent<SRS,WRS>
    A container with data provided to RateListener by SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuringExecutorService.
    SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuringExecutorService<C extends SubmitterWorkerScheduledTaskConfig<E,SRS,WRS>,E extends SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuredEvent<SRS,WRS>,SRS,WRS>
    This RateMeasuringExecutorService assigns two roles to its threads: submitter and worker.
    SubmitterWorkerScheduledTaskConfig<E extends RateMeasuredEvent,SRS,WRS>
    A configuration of a scheduled task for SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuringExecutorService.
    SubmitterWorkerScheduledTaskConfig.Builder<E extends RateMeasuredEvent,SRS,WRS>  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CorrectnessException
    See RateListener.onMeasurement(RateMeasuredEvent).
    RateException
    See RateListener.onMeasurement(RateMeasuredEvent).
